item.title: Mentioned by Kawartha Media Group
item.description:
Home News MP calls County's Trent-Severn Waterway group 'a...
Peterborough This Week. BySarah Frank. A day after Peterborough County Council signed on to participate in a stakeholders group focused on how to maximize the Trent-Severn Waterway's potential, MP Dean Del Mastro has criticized the move as fruitless.

item.title: Mentioned by Kawartha Media Group
item.description:
Home News Oops. MP tells City to apply for program that no...
PETERBOROUGH -- Among a couple suggestions to better promote Peterborough, MP Dean Del Mastro recently encouraged the City to apply to Heritage Canada's Cultural Capitals of Canada program. The only problem is, the program no longer exists.

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
Minister Goodyear Visits Peterborough to Discuss Future Plans for Jobs, Growth ...
PETERBOROUGH, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - July 26, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario) along with Dean Del Mastro, Member of Parliament for Peterborough, made a number ... "I'm pleased to be here in Peterborough with my colleague MP Del Mastro and to participate in these roundtable discussions to make certain we continue to create programs that help the businesses and workers in this community.".
